attributes.action: Immediately Save The Homes & SME Jobs That We Are Bleeding Daily!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst the PM’s bank bail-out money takes its time to percolate down to help the ordinary people, we are losing jobs and homes as we speak  --  inflicting permanent damages to our social psyche. 

So the PM should, on humanitarian grounds, immediately declare a 90-day moratorium on distressed debt payments by households and small businesses, and on home repossessions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
